subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Shanghai Bobby rallied to the lead with less than a furlong to go in the Hopeful Stakes for 2-year-olds by three and three-quarter lengths at Saratoga Race Course.
snippet: Shanghai Bobby rallied to the lead with less than a furlong to go in the Hopeful Stakes for 2-year-olds by three and three-quarter lengths at Saratoga Race Course.
